price: Nuko agenzura inyoni maze aravuga ati “Ko ntabona Samusure (Hud Hud)? Cyangwa iri mu zidahari?
arabic: وَتَفَقَّدَ ٱلطَّيۡرَ فَقَالَ مَالِيَ لَآ أَرَى ٱلۡهُدۡهُدَ أَمۡ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡغَآئِبِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: watafaqqada al-ṭayra faqāla mā liya lā arā al-hud'huda am kāna mina al-ghāibīna
